mapper.select: SELECT A.created_at AS createdAt, A.point_amount AS pointAmount FROM company_point_deposit A INNER JOIN `admin` B ON A.admin_id = B.admin_id INNER JOIN company C ON B.division_id = C.company_id WHERE C.company_id = #{companyId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}

SELECT A.created_at AS createdAt, A.point_amount AS pointAmount , A.user_id AS userId, D.`name` FROM user_point_deposit A INNER JOIN `admin` B ON A.admin_id = B.admin_id INNER JOIN company C ON B.division_id = C.company_id INNER JOIN `user` D ON A.user_id = D.user_id WHERE C.company_id = #{companyId} LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
